title: 85x5: Applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) to Former Senior Employees of the Civil Aeronautics Board
summary: Even though certain functions of CAB were integrated into the existing structure of the DOT, 18 U.S.C. § 207(c)'s restrictive language refers explicitly to representations to the agency where the former employer served, and there was no portion of the DOT that could be considered the CAB for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c).
